name: Clero
overview: Push all the blocks to the red space to destroy them, push orange balls together to remove them, or push them at walls or blocks to destroy the walls or blocks. See how far you can get in the lowest number of moves. A game for one or two players by André Treptow. It was released in both a Freeware and a Shareware version. Push the numbered blocks together to clear them out and move to the next level.
